: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus continues to walk forward as the fire passes by. He feels the heat, but keeps a smirk on his face.
Rodimus Prime: I am an Autobot; and I do not need your permission to speak!
Although Rodimus' rifle was in subspace, Roddy had his forearm blasters charged.
Rodimus Prime: I am here to talk to Optimus, but dont push me Hydras. I'll be happy to avenge all the evil you have committed in the past. Both the Megatron part and the Galvatron part of you!
 aerosmith4e@... wrote:Hydras shot fire from his eyes past both sides of rodimus ment to miss half an 
inch from him on each side. "Did anyone tell you to speak maximal? I want 
tnothing more then to tear u apart right now but I am here to listen to 
Prime...how bout we just have a big free for all right now, i havent slagged a 
spark ina  while. Prime are u awake?" his two tails slammed against the ground 
and shook it.
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus stood still, now standing close to the others.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Are you two going to stand around or are we here to talk?
> 
>
